episodeList.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Takaharu and Yui Tezuka are architects who focus on human connection, sometimes literally removing walls between us in a bid to change lives and society itself. Explore new lifestyles for a new era.
episode.description: Takaharu and Yui Tezuka are architects who focus on human connection, sometimes literally removing walls between us in a bid to change lives and society itself. Explore new lifestyles for a new era.
episode.subtitle: Takaharu & Yui Tezuka, Architects
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Shigeyama Sengoro, a Kyogen comic actor, believes people need relaxing laughter to get through this crisis. He is exploring streamed performances to perpetuate the 650-year-old performing art.
episode.description: Shigeyama Sengoro, a Kyogen comic actor, believes people need relaxing laughter to get through this crisis. He is exploring streamed performances to perpetuate the 650-year-old performing art.
episode.subtitle: Shigeyama Sengoro XIV, Kyogen Actor
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Born in Kyoto Prefecture, Matsumoto Myokei is a leading Buddhist sculptor in Japan. He believes his mission is to carve Buddhist statues that will soothe people's hearts during this crisis.
episode.description: Born in Kyoto, Matsumoto Myokei is a leading Buddhist sculptor in Japan. He believes his mission is to carve Buddhist statues that will soothe people's hearts during this crisis.
episode.subtitle: Matsumoto Myokei, Buddhist Sculptor
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Blanche Wiesen Cook is a historian and an author of bestselling biography on Eleanor Roosevelt. Cook keeps educating people to achieve dignity for all by learning from history.
episode.description: Blanche Wiesen Cook is a historian and an author of bestselling biography on Eleanor Roosevelt. Cook keeps educating people to achieve dignity for all by learning from history.
episode.subtitle: Blanche Wiesen Cook, Author, Historian, Educator
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Yoshua Bengio, a global frontrunner in AI research and a recipient of the Turing Award in 2019, talks about how AI can be used to fight the pandemic.
episode.description: Yoshua Bengio, a global frontrunner in AI research and a recipient of the Turing Award in 2019, talks about how AI can be used to fight the pandemic.
episode.subtitle: Yoshua Bengio, Computer Scientist
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: For former astronaut Chris Hadfield, life in self-isolation amid a pandemic is similar to that of an astronaut in space. We asked how he is coping with sequestering during this pandemic.
episode.description: For former astronaut Chris Hadfield, life in self-isolation amid a pandemic is similar to that of an astronaut in space. We asked how he is coping with sequestering during this pandemic.
episode.subtitle: Chris Hadfield, Former Astronaut
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Successive headmasters of Kyoto's oldest ikebana school honor the spirit of imbuing life into the flowers they arrange. Senko Ikenobo discusses the importance and universality of living with nature.
episode.description: Successive headmasters of Kyoto's oldest ikebana school honor the spirit of imbuing life into the flowers they arrange. Senko Ikenobo discusses the importance and universality of living with nature.
episode.subtitle: Senko Ikenobo, Headmaster Designate of Ikenobo Ikebana, Buddhist Monk
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona

episode.content: Osaka University professor Hiroshi Ishiguro, who leads the field of humanlike robots, discusses how living in harmony with remote-controlled robots and avatars in the near future will change society.
episode.description: Osaka University professor Hiroshi Ishiguro, who leads the field of humanlike robots, discusses how living in harmony with remote-controlled robots and avatars in the near future will change society.
episode.subtitle: Hiroshi Ishiguro, Roboticist
episode.title: We, in the Time of Corona
